summary: A drifter helps a ranch couple fend off the approaches of a ruthless landowner.
cast: Ken Clark|Yvonne Bastien|Piero Lulli|Howard Ross|Alfonso Rojas|Antonio Gradoli|Francisco Sanz|Livio Lorenzon|Renato Terra|Ángel Ortiz|José Canalejas|Frank Braña|Simón Arriaga|Alfonso de la Vega|Guillermo Méndez
director: Directors: Antonio Román (as Anthony Roman), Mario Bava (uncredited)
title: Ringo de Nebraska
